segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children on the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is trying to reach into an open cabinet labeled "COOKIE JAR".
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool's legs are splayed out, making it look incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilting backward, almost ready to tip over completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching for those cookies, with one hand already inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm raised, clearly hoping for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up with such an eager, expectant face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm holding my breath, waiting for the inevitable fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to get hurt if that stool goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret cookie raid feels incredibly risky given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder how they manage to coordinate such mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
